GSD.description:
staging: rtl8723bs: remove a third possible deadlock

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.5 by commit d330f1d4f797b05c85eaa76ad1db114f7214bd61. For more details please see the references link.
